name: 陳怡倩
objective:
本課程著重於探索問卷研究方法與統計資料分析。同學將對問卷調查研究有通盤的了解。本課程將介紹問卷調查研究的整體流程，從問卷的建構與施行起始，其中包含問卷問題的設計、抽樣、問卷模式與施行；再著重於問卷資料的分析與統計結果的報告呈現。同學將於這門課運用各類統計分析方法進行問卷研究的實作。
This course focuses on exploring the methods and techniques in survey research and data analysis. Students will be guided to develop a comprehensive understanding of survey research methods. The course will introduce all aspects of the survey research process: from exploring the construction and implementation of surveys–including the design of survey questionnaires, sample selection, choice of survey mode, and survey administration–onto the analysis of survey data and reporting of results. Students will also gain first-hand experience of survey analysis using a variety of statistical techniques.
schedule:
Week 1 Course introduction
Week 2 Research question, research design, & hypothesis generation
Week 3 Conceptualizing, Operationalizing, and Measuring Variables
Week 4 Sampling
Week 5 Survey Research Modes, Designs, & Ethics
Week 6 Survey Participation and Nonresponse
Week 7 Survey Instrumentation
Week 8 Constructing Better Questionnaires and Questions
Week 9 Evaluating Survey Questions
Week 10 Survey Data Processing, Data Analysis, & Statistical Result Write-up I
Week 11 Survey Data Processing, Data Analysis, & Statistical Result Write-up II
Weel 12 Survey Data Processing, Data Analysis, & Statistical Result Write-up III
Week 13 Survey Data Processing, Data Analysis, & Statistical Result Write-up IV
Week 14 Survey Data Processing, Data Analysis, & Statistical Result Write-up V
Week 15 Review
Week 16 Final project presentations
Week 17 Final project presentations
Week 18 Dragon Boat Festival (no class)
scorePolicy: Class quizzes, assignments & activities (70%); final project & presentation (30%).
materials:
Groves, R. M., Fowler, F., Couper, M. P., Lepkowski, J. M., Singer, E., & Tourangeau, R. (2009). Survey methodology (2nd ed.). Wiley.
Larson-Hall, J. (2015). A guide to doing statistics in second language research using SPSS and R (2nd ed.). Routledge.
Singleton, Jr., R. A., & Straits, B. C. (2018). Approaches to social research (6th ed.). Oxford University Press.
